question.title: Design a class
question.content:
Design a class as described below.

class name : MyClass
function: function name - display(), parameters - none, return type - void , access modifier - public, function body - should print "Hello World"

Note: The driver's code will call the display function of the MyClass

Example:

Input: None
Output: "Hello World"

rephrased.body: Design a class named `MyClass` with a public function called `display()` that takes no parameters and returns void. The `display()` function should print "Hello World" to the console.

testcases.explanation: The `display()` function is called, which prints "Hello World" to the console. No input is required.

hints:
Java:

class MyClass{

public void display(){

System.out.println("Hello World");

}

}

CPP:

class MyClass{
public:
    void display(){
        cout<<"Hello World"<<endl;
    }
};
